ygData.subject: Re: Re:Gladiators
ygData.msgSnippet: Umm...kid, did you know that it s ILLEGAL to give away the code to others who don t buy it?  Buying the code from the makers of the game will allow you to play
ygData.rawEmail:
X-Digest-Num: 61
Message-ID: <17248.61.160.959279670@...>
Date: Thu, 18 Nov 1999 07:10:01 -0600
From: Robert J Sier <rsace@...>
Subject: Re: Re:Gladiators

Umm...kid, did you know that it's ILLEGAL to give away the code to others
who don't buy it?  Buying the code from the makers of the game will allow
you to play it AND allow them to improve the game more.  So, why not just
buy it?

Safe, legal, and makes the game better...all for $10.
